files.patch:
@@ -42,2 +42,2 @@
-include native/LinkUnix.gmk
-include native/LinkWindows.gmk
+include native/Link.gmk
+include native/LinkMicrosoft.gmk
@@ -203,2 +203,2 @@
-  ifeq ($(call isTargetOsType, unix), true)
-    $$(eval $$(call SetupLinkingUnix,$1))
+  ifneq ($(TOOLCHAIN_TYPE), microsoft)
+    $$(eval $$(call SetupLinking,$1))
@@ -206,1 +206,1 @@
-    $$(eval $$(call SetupLinkingWindows,$1))
+    $$(eval $$(call SetupLinkingMicrosoft,$1))
@@ -212,2 +212,2 @@
-  ifeq ($(call isTargetOsType, unix), true)
-    $$(eval $$(call CreateLinkedResultUnix,$1))
+  ifneq ($(TOOLCHAIN_TYPE), microsoft)
+    $$(eval $$(call CreateLinkedResult,$1))
@@ -215,1 +215,1 @@
-    $$(eval $$(call CreateLinkedResultWindows,$1))
+    $$(eval $$(call CreateLinkedResultMicrosoft,$1))

@@ -51,1 +51,1 @@
-define SetupLinkingUnix
+define SetupLinking
@@ -73,1 +73,1 @@
-define CreateLinkedResultUnix
+define CreateLinkedResult
@@ -75,1 +75,1 @@
-    $$(eval $$(call CreateStaticLibraryUnix,$1))
+    $$(eval $$(call CreateStaticLibrary,$1))
@@ -77,1 +77,1 @@
-    $$(eval $$(call CreateDynamicLibraryOrExecutableUnix,$1))
+    $$(eval $$(call CreateDynamicLibraryOrExecutable,$1))
@@ -82,1 +82,1 @@
-define CreateStaticLibraryUnix
+define CreateStaticLibrary
@@ -165,1 +165,1 @@
-define CreateDynamicLibraryOrExecutableUnix
+define CreateDynamicLibraryOrExecutable

@@ -32,1 +32,1 @@
-define SetupLinkingWindows
+define SetupLinkingMicrosoft
@@ -43,1 +43,1 @@
-define CreateLinkedResultWindows
+define CreateLinkedResultMicrosoft
@@ -45,1 +45,1 @@
-    $$(eval $$(call CreateStaticLibraryWindows,$1))
+    $$(eval $$(call CreateStaticLibraryMicrosoft,$1))
@@ -47,1 +47,1 @@
-    $$(eval $$(call CreateDynamicLibraryOrExecutableWindows,$1))
+    $$(eval $$(call CreateDynamicLibraryOrExecutableMicrosoft,$1))
@@ -52,1 +52,1 @@
-define CreateStaticLibraryWindows
+define CreateStaticLibraryMicrosoft
@@ -70,1 +70,1 @@
-define CreateDynamicLibraryOrExecutableWindows
+define CreateDynamicLibraryOrExecutableMicrosoft
